articles.content:

articles.title: Willey to retire from England duty after World Cup
articles.description: England bowler David Willey will retire from international cricket at the end of the World Cup aged 33.
articles.content:
England bowler David Willey will retire from international cricket at the end of the World Cup.
The 33-year-old has played in England's past three matches in India, taking five wickets and scoring 3… [+744 chars]
